DOC.brief_title: Dopexamine Norepinephrine Compared With Epinephrine Alone Septic Shock
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To compare combination dopexamine norepinephrine epinephrine alone gastric mucosal blood flow ( GMBF ) , hepatic damage oxidative stress septic shock . Setting : Surgical intensive care unit university hospital . Design : Prospective , randomize , control study 2 parallel group . Patients : Adults fulfil usual criterion septic shock . Interventions : Systemic hemodynamics , GMBF ( laser-Doppler ) , plasma α-glutathione S-transferase , aspartate aminotransferase , alanine aminotransferase malondialdehyde assess catecholamine infusion ( T0 ) , soon mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) reach 70-80 mmHg ( T1 ) , 2 ( T2 ) 6 ( T3 ) hour T1 . Drugs titrate 0.2 µg/kg/min 0.2 µg/kg/min increment every 3 min epinephrine norepinephrine , 0.5 µg/kg/min 0.5 µg/kg/min increment every 3 min dopexamine .
